p: According to the survival status at 30 days post-admission, patients were divided into survival and deceased groups. Baseline characteristics of these patients were then compared. To identify the risk factors for 30-day mortality in Flu-p patients, variables with P-values < 0.1 in univariate analysis and influenza virus type A were entered into the multivariate Cox regression analysis. All analyses were performed using Statistical Package for Social Science 22.0 (SPSS, Chicago, IL, USA).
